Sample code

I started learning programming in early April 2020, while on furlough from work due to COVID-19. While I returned to work less than a month later, I've continued to progress in learning and intentionally improving my coding abilities. Right now I have a basic understanding of Node.js, PHP and MySQL; am comfortable using Django, Git and Bootstrap; and I am adept at Python, HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript.

About Me

I grew up in Gainesville, FL. I enjoy music, reading and riding my bike. I am a native English speaker and am also fluent in Mandarain Chinese and conversant in Spanish.

About me

Education

After working full-time for almost 2 years, I returned to school in 2015 and completed a Bachelor of Arts in Mandarin Chinese in 2017. Since then I have also earned certificates in TEFL, Python and various other programming languages.
